Dialogue: Oh hey, whatcha up to today?
The rain got through the roof again last night, I didn't get much sleep.
I heard Karen is gonna give a sermon later.
I'm not sure what's up with her but we still have to go . . .
Wonder if it's related to the news we heard this morning?
I'd leave and explore the world with you but I'm too afraid to go out.
But be sure to tell me what it's like out there when you're back!
I can't believe it! Someday I'll go out there too.
I wish I had the courage to go out and see the world like you.
